content: The **Singapore men's national under-16 basketball team** is a national [basketball](/wiki/Basketball) team of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), administered by the [Basketball Association of Singapore](/wiki/Basketball_Association_of_Singapore). It represents the country in men's international under-16 basketball competitions. ## FIBA Under-16 Asia Cup So far, Singapore's only participation at the [FIBA Under-16 Asia Cup](/wiki/FIBA_Under-16_Asia_Cup) was in (/wiki/2009_FIBA_Asia_Under-16_Championship), where they finished in 14th place. - [Singapore men's national basketball team](/wiki/Singapore_men%27s_national_basketball_team) - [Singapore men's national under-18 basketball team](/wiki/Singapore_men%27s_national_under-18_basketball_team) - [Singapore women's national under-16 basketball team](/wiki/Singapore_women%27s_national_under-16_basketball_team) - Archived records of Singapore team participations This article about a national basketball team is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This article about sports in Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Singapore men's national under-16 basketball team
